description: Jiyan, leader of the Midnight Rangers, acts with swift and resolute righteousness. He possesses the formidable ability to conjure a powerful Qingloong from the winds, making him invincible on the battlefield.

descriptionLocalized.vi: Jiyan, thủ lĩnh của Midnight Rangers, hành động với sự chính trực nhanh chóng và kiên quyết. Anh ta sở hữu khả năng đáng gờm để triệu hồi một Qingloong hùng mạnh từ gió, khiến anh ta bất khả chiến bại trên chiến trường.
descriptionLocalized.id: Jiyan, pemimpin Midnight Rangers, bertindak dengan keadilan yang cepat dan teguh. Dia memiliki kemampuan yang menakutkan untuk memanggil Qingloong yang kuat dari angin, membuatnya tak terkalahkan di medan perang.
descriptionLocalized.th: จียาน ผู้นำของ Midnight Rangers กระทำด้วยความยุติธรรมอันรวดเร็วและแน่วแน่ เขาครอบครองพลังอันน่าเกรงขามในการร่ายมนตร์ Qingloong อันทรงพลังจากสายลม ทำให้เขาไม่อาจเอาชนะได้ในสนามรบ

quote: I have never regretted to brave the long night.

quoteLocalized.vi: Tôi chưa bao giờ hối hận vì đã dũng cảm đối mặt với đêm dài.
quoteLocalized.id: Aku tidak pernah menyesal untuk menghadapi malam yang panjang.
quoteLocalized.th: Aku tidak pernah menyesal untuk menantang malam panjang ini.

resonanceChain.name: Benevolence
resonanceChain.description:
Resonance Skill **Windqueller** can be used 1 more time.
When casting Resonance Skill **Windqueller**, the "Resolve" cost is decreased by {1}.

resonanceChain.name: Versatility
resonanceChain.description: After casting Intro Skill **Tactical Strike**, Jiyan gains {0} "Resolve" and his ATK is increased by {1} for {2}s. This can be triggered once every {3}s.

resonanceChain.name: Spectation
resonanceChain.description: When casting Resonance Skill **Windqueller**, Resonance Liberation **Emerald Storm: Prelude**, Resonance Skill **Emerald Storm: Finale** or Intro Skill **Tactical Strike**, Jiyan's Crit. Rate is increased by {0} and Crit. DMG is increased by {1} for {2}s.

resonanceChain.name: Prudence
resonanceChain.description: When casting Resonance Liberation **Emerald Storm: Prelude** or Resonance Liberation **Emerald Storm: Finale**, the Heavy Attack DMG Bonus of all team members is increased by {0} for {1}s.

resonanceChain.name: Resolution
resonanceChain.description:
The DMG multiplier of Outro Skill **Discipline** is increased by {0}.
When Jiyan's attacks hit a target, his ATK is increased by {1} for {2}s, stacking up to {3} times; this effect is immediately maxed after he casts Intro Skill **Tactical Strike**.

resonanceChain.name: Fortitude
resonanceChain.description:
Every time **Heavy Attack**, Intro Skill **Tactical Strike** or Resonance Skill **Windqueller** is used, Jiyan gains {0} stack(s) of "Momentum", stacking up to {1} times.
Resonance Liberation **Emerald Storm: Finale** will consume all "Momentum", and each stack consumed increases the DMG multiplier of Resonance Liberation **Emerald Storm: Finale** by {2}.

skills.name: Lone Lance
skills.description:
**Basic Attack**
Jiyan performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG**.
 
**Heavy Attack**
Jiyan consumes Stamina to thrust forward, dealing Aero DMG**.
 
**Heavy Attack: Windborne Strike**
Hold the **Basic Attack** during **Heavy Attack** to cast **Windborne Strike** after the **Heavy Attack** ends, dealing Aero DMG**.
 
**Heavy Attack: Abyssal Slash**
Release the **Basic Attack** during the **Heavy Attack** to cast **Abyssal Slash** after the **Heavy Attack** ends, dealing Aero DMG**.
 
**Mid-air Attack**
Jiyan consumes Stamina to perform a Mid-Air Plunging Attack, dealing Aero DMG**.
After the **Plunging Attack**, use **Basic Attack** to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Aero DMG**.
 
**Mid-air Attack: Banner of Triumph**
After casting the Heavy Attack **Windborne Strike** or the Resonance Skill **Windqueller** in the air, Jiyan can perform a mid-air attack, dealing Aero DMG**.
 
**Dodge Counter**
Use a **Basic Attack** after a successful **Dodge** to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG**.

skills.name: Windqueller
skills.description:
Dash forward a certain distance, dealing Aero DMG**.
 
Can be cast in the air.

skills.name: Emerald Storm: Prelude
skills.description:
After releasing Emerald Storm: Prelude, Jiyan enters **Qingloong Mode**.
 
**Qingloong Mode**
Jiyan has increased Anti-interruption;
**Basic Attack**, **Heavy Attack** and **Dodge Counter** are replaced with Heavy Attack **Lance of Qingloong**.
 
**Heavy Attack: Lance of Qingloong**
Perform up to 3 continuous attacks, dealing Aero DMG**, considered as Heavy Attack damage.

skills.name: Heavenly Balance
skills.description: After casting the Intro Skill **Tactical Strike**, Jiyan's ATK is increased by 10%** for 15**s.

skills.name: Tempest Taming
skills.description: When Jiyan's attacks hit a target, Jiyan's Crit. DMG is increased by 12%** for 8**s.

skills.name: Tactical Strike
skills.description: Jiyan pierces the target in mid-air, dealing Aero DMG**.

skills.name: Qingloong at War
skills.description:
When casting Resonance Skill **Windqueller**, if Jiyan has 30** or more "Resolve", he consumes 30** "Resolve" to increase the damage of this Resonance Skill **Windqueller** by 20%**.
When Jiyan is in **Qingloong Mode**, DMG of Resonance Skill **Windqueller** is increased by 20%** and no longer consumes "Resolve".
 
**Resonance Liberation: Emerald Storm: Finale**
When casting Resonance Liberation **Emerald Storm: Prelude**, if Jiyan has 30** "Resolve" or more, he will consume 30** "Resolve" to cast Emerald Storm: Finale, dealing Aero DMG**, considered as Heavy Attack damage.
Emerald Storm: Finale can be cast in mid-air at low altitude.
 
**Resolve**
Jiyan can hold up to 60** Resolve.
Jiyan gains "Resolve" when his Normal Attack **Lone Lance** hits the target.
Jiyan gains "Resolve" when the Intro Skill **Tactical Strike** hits the target.
If Jiyan does not hit a target within 15**s, his "Resolve" will gradually decrease.

skills.name: Skillful Cooking
skills.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

skills.name: Discipline
skills.description: When the next character's Heavy Attack hits a target, Jiyan will summon Qingloong to launch a Coordinated Attack, dealing Aero DMG** equal to 313.40%** of Jiyan's ATK. This attack lasts for 8**s, and can be triggered once every 1**s, up to 2 times.
